channel.title: Server problem
channel.description: I'm using DemolishScape v9 and noticed that I can only connect to the DemolishScape client. When I tried connecting to the silabsoft client it just logged me out after I logged in. What do I do to make it so you can connect from any client?

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Take out the UID crap.

Read full topic
